unit: Unit 7 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Means
title: Changes in $t$-distribution with Decrease of D.O.F.
question_text: Which of the following correctly describes the changes in the $t$-distribution when the degrees of freedom decreases?

choices.text: The center decreases, the spread increases and the shape becomes less normal.
The center decreases, the spread increases and the shape becomes more normal.
The center increases, the spread decreases and the shape becomes less normal.
The center remains the same, the spread decreases and the shape becomes more normal.
The center remains the same, the spread increases and the shape becomes less normal.
